title: Tender Psycho
description: He's my brother's best friend.Nathanos Huntington-Graves is unlike anything I've ever seen. Rich, handsome, sophisticated...magnetic.I wanted him from the moment I laid eyes on him and counted my lucky star when he wanted me back.But head over heels, I failed to see the warning signs.The man who at first seemed so gentle has a whole other side to him.And it's a lot more dangerous than I ever could have thought.
author: Ever Lilac
